mapper.select: select from groups g LEFT JOIN group_user gu on g.id=gu.group_id where g.id=#{ID}
mapper.update: update groups set status=#{status} where id=#{ID}
mapper.select: select from groups g where g.status=#{status}
select from groups g LEFT JOIN group_user gu ON gu.group_id=g.id left JOIN group_goods gg on g.group_goods_id = gg.id where g.`status`='CONVENING' and gu.`status`='PAID' and gg.deadline <= now()

select from groups g LEFT JOIN group_user gu ON gu.group_id=g.id inner JOIN group_goods gg on g.group_goods_id = gg.id where g.`status`='CONVENING' and( select count(1) from group_user gu where gu.group_id=g.id and gu.`status`='PAID' )>=gg.minpeople
select from groups g LEFT JOIN group_user gu ON gu.group_id=g.id and g.leader_uid = gu.uid where g.`status`='NEW' and gu.status = 'CLOSED'

select from groups g left JOIN group_goods gg on g.group_goods_id = gg.id LEFT JOIN group_user gu ON gu.group_id=g.id where g.`status`='CONVENING' and TIME_TO_SEC(g.start)+gg.duration < TIME_TO_SEC(now()) and ( select count(1) from group_user gu where gu.group_id=g.id and gu.`status`='PAID' )<gg.minpeople
select from groups g LEFT JOIN group_user gu ON gu.group_id=g.id where g.`status`='NEW' and gu.status='PAID'
